EmailTemplate.name: AutoRABIT VIP Party at DF17 on Nov.6th|7PM V1 Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: AutoRABIT VIP Party at DF17 on Nov.6th|7PM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Hope you are well.
I wanted to personally invite you to AutoRABIT VIP Party at DF17 on Nov.6th|7PM Pl join us on Monday evening for cocktails and food overlooking the city, and networking with fellow IT execs and the Salesforce DX team.
I would love to save you a seat and therefore can you RSVP back to this email?
Thank you for your time.
Regards, Navneeth Rokalla Account Management Phone US : +1 925 218 1947 |
